title: Looking for a duo partner (Bronze)
body:
I am currently in bronze 3 and have been for the past few months finding it hard to progress up the solo queue ladder. I have been playing since September of 2014 and only picked up ranked earlier this year. Currently I am looking for a duo partner since I find that my solo queue games are quite inconsistent at the moment without having someone to queue up with. I will play anywhere besides the bottom lane playing predominantly as the assassin/fighter role playing champions such as Talon, Fiora, Nocturne ect. If you are interested in playing with me add a message down below mentioning your rank and where you play. Add me - SilverFlare 20
Looking forward to playing with you

replies.body:
B3 

I main support usually morg or blitz and sometimes play top lane but I am trying to learn jungle.

I'm also finding it hard to solo queue because there are too many afks and trolls
I'll add you later today and we can hopefully play some ranked on the weekend {{champion:119}}
